message:
SYSTEM: PROLEGintro_eng_long.pdf: Página 51
Translation from PROLOG(ASP) to PROLEG
Let P be the following PROLOG program:
C: −B11, ..., B1n1, not E11, ..., not E1m1.
C: −B21, ..., B2n2, not E21, ..., not E2m1.
...
C: −Bk1, ..., Bknk, not Ek1, ..., not Ekmk.
Then, a translation of a PROLOG program P, tro(P) is deﬁned as
the following PROLEG program ⟨Ho, Eo⟩where Ho is as follows:
C ⇐C1.
C1 ⇐B11, ..., B1n1.
C ⇐C2.
C2 ⇐B21, ..., B2n2.
...
C ⇐Ck.
Ck ⇐Bk1, ..., Bknk.
and Ee is as follows:
exception(C1, E11).
· · ·
exception(C1, E1m1).
exception(C2, E21).
· · ·
exception(C2, E2m2).
...
exception(Ck, Ek1).
· · ·
exception(Ck, Ekmk).
51
speaker: SYSTEM
